body.p: Vanderburgh County, Indiana, farmer. Native of England. Married to Sarah Grooms Berridge. Father of Emily Berridge, John Berridge, Robert Berridge, James Berridge, Isaac Berridge, and Martha Berridge. Farmer in Vanderburgh County, Indiana, in 1850. Farmer in Vanderburgh County in 1860.
